forgot.title: FORGOT PASSWORD
header.title: SSO From Anywhere
init.account.title: Account Initialization
init.account.text: The link you have clicked on has expired. A new link has been generated and sent to the email address associated to your account. If you do not receive any mail, please contact your HR.
new.password.title: Enter your password
new.password.text:
Reminder: your password should contain at least 8 characters and 3 of 4 following attributes :
-Uppercase
-Lowercase
-Numbers
-Special symbols: € , ! ? % ^ . * = - + @ # _ … ()
new.password.error.password.policy:
The password does not meet the password policy requirements.
Check the minimum password length,
password complexity and password history requirements.
reinit.password.title: Password Reinitialization
reinit.password.text: An initialization link has been sent to the email address associated to your account. If you don’t receive any mail, please contact your HR.
